pages.text: Dalmanites is a small trilobite with slightly convex exoskeletons. Its head is semicircular and the tail is pointed. Like other trilobites, Dalmanites would have been a bottom feeder, foraging for food on the ocean floor.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
